name: IJsonApi
description:
An attestation request that fetches data from the given url and then edits the information with a
 jq transformation.
verification:
Data is fetched from an url `url`. The received data is then processed with jq as
 the `postprocessJq` states. The structure of the final json is written in the `abi_signature`.
 The response contains an abi encoding of the final data.

proof.name: Proof

params.name: merkleProof
params.comment: Merkle proof corresponding to the attestation response.

request.name: Request

params.name: messageIntegrityCode
params.comment: `MessageIntegrityCode` that is derived from the expected response.

params.name: requestBody
params.comment: Data defining the request. Type (struct) and interpretation is determined

response.name: Response

params.name: votingRound
params.comment: The ID of the State Connector round in which the request was considered.

params.name: lowestUsedTimestamp
params.comment: The lowest timestamp used to generate the response.

params.name: responseBody
params.comment: Data defining the response. The verification rules for the construction

requestBody.name: RequestBody
requestBody.description: Request body for Payment attestation type

params.name: postprocessJq
params.comment: jq filter to postprocess the data

responseBody.name: ResponseBody
responseBody.description: Response body for Payment attestation type
responseBody.fullComment:
@notice Response body for Payment attestation type
 @param abi_encoded_data ABI encoded data
